languages.text: Судьба дефективных сервиторов была решена — больше ничто не могло отвлечь Лорд-капитана от {mf|его|ее} миссии.

traits.locale_text: Судьба дефективных сервиторов была решена — больше ничто не могло отвлечь Лорд-капитана от {mf|его|ее} миссии.

languages.text: With the fate of the defective servitors decided, nothing could now distract the Lord Captain from {mf|his|her} mission.
languages.original_text: Судьба дефективных сервиторов была решена — больше ничто не могло отвлечь Лорд-капитана от {mf|его|ее} миссии.

traits.locale_text: With the fate of the defective servitors decided, nothing could now distract the Lord Captain from {mf|his|her} mission.
With the fate of the defective servitors decided, nothing could now distract the Lord Captain from {mf|his|her} mission.
With the fate of the defective servitors decided, nothing could now distract the Lord Captain from {mf|his|her} mission.
With the fate of the defective servitors decided, nothing could now distract the Lord Captain from {mf|his|her} mission.
With the fate of the defective servitors decided, nothing could now distract the Lord Captain from {mf|his|her} mission.

languages.text: 不良サーヴィターたちの運命が決まったことで、もはや何事もロード・キャプテンの注意をミッションからそらすことはできなかった。
languages.original_text: With the fate of the defective servitors decided, nothing could now distract the Lord Captain from {mf|his|her} mission.

traits.locale_text: 不良サーヴィターたちの運命が決まったことで、もはや何事もロード・キャプテンの注意をミッションからそらすことはできなかった。

languages.text: Le sort des servitors défectueux ainsi décidé, plus rien ne pouvait détourner Sa Seigneurie de sa mission.
languages.original_text: With the fate of the defective servitors decided, nothing could now distract the Lord Captain from {mf|his|her} mission.

traits.locale_text: Le sort des servitors défectueux ainsi décidé, plus rien ne pouvait détourner Sa Seigneurie de sa mission.

languages.text: 那些发生故障的机仆已经得到了妥善处置，舰长大人也无需再分心忙于其他事情了。
languages.original_text: With the fate of the defective servitors decided, nothing could now distract the Lord Captain from {mf|his|her} mission.

traits.locale_text: 那些发生故障的奴工已经得到了妥善处置，舰长大人也无需再分心忙于其他事情了。

languages.text: Con el destino de los servidores defectuosos decidido, ya nada podía distraer a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán de su misión.
languages.original_text: With the fate of the defective servitors decided, nothing could now distract the Lord Captain from {mf|his|her} mission.

traits.locale_text: Con el destino de los servidores defectuosos decidido, ya nada podía distraer a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán de su misión.

languages.text: Nachdem über das Schicksal der defekten Servitoren entschieden worden war, konnte den Lord Captain nichts mehr von seiner Mission ablenken.
languages.original_text: With the fate of the defective servitors decided, nothing could now distract the Lord Captain from {mf|his|her} mission.

traits.locale_text: Nachdem über das Schicksal der defekten Servitoren entschieden worden war, konnte den Lord Captain nichts mehr von seiner Mission ablenken.

languages.text: Defolu hizmetörler artık sorun teşkil etmediği için Lord Kaptan'ı asıl vazifesinden alıkoyan bir şey de kalmamıştı.
languages.original_text: With the fate of the defective servitors decided, nothing could now distract the Lord Captain from {mf|his|her} mission.

traits.locale_text: Defolu hizmetörler artık sorun teşkil etmediği için Lord Kaptan'ı asıl vazifesinden alıkoyan bir şey de kalmamıştı.
